question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding food chain and food web?
1. A food web shows all possible transfers of energy and nutrients among the organisms in an ecosystem, whereas
a food chain traces only a single pathway of the food.
2. If any of the intermediate food chain is removed, there is no major effect on the succeeding links.
Select the correct option form the codes given below:
explanation:
A food web shows all possible transfers of energy and nutrients among the organisms in an ecosystem, whereas
a food chain traces only a single pathway of the food. If any of the intermediate food chain is removed, it can have devastating effects on succeeding links.
